metadata.title: CVE-2022-44729 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) vulnerability in Apache SoftwareFoundation Apache XML Graphics Batik.This issue affects Apache XML GraphicsBatik: 1.16. On version 1.16, a malicious SVG could trigger loadingexternal resources by default, causing resource consumption or in somecases even information disclosure. Users are recommended to upgrade toversion 1.17 or later.

criterions.comment: batik: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
